file.name: agile-metrics-core-open-api.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Agile Metrics core
  description: ''
  version: 1.0.0
tags:
  - name: metrics
    description: Agile Metrics core
paths:
  /metrics/:
    put:
      tags:
        - metrics
      summary: Update existing metric entries pulled from request
      operationId: updateMetrics
      requestBody:
        description: Update existing metric entries pulled from request
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/CoreConfigRequest'
        required: true
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
          content:
            text/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiResponse'
        405:
          description: Validation exception
          content: { }
    post:
      tags:
        - metrics
      summary: Add metric entries pulled from request
      operationId: addMetrics
      requestBody:
        description: Add metric entries pulled from request
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/CoreConfigRequest'
        required: true
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
          content:
            text/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiResponse'
        405:
          description: Invalid input
          content: { }


components:
  schemas:
    CoreConfigRequest:
      type: object
      properties:
        config:
          type: object
          properties:
            metricType:
              type: string
            since:
              type: string
              format: date
            until:
              type: string
              format: date
            type:
              type: string
              enum: [csv]
            srcType:
              type: string
              enum: [inline]
            inlineData:
              type: array
              items:
                type: object
                description: |
                  The entry data
                  {
                   "createdAt": "2018-12-03T00:00:00Z",
                   "teamName": "someTeam",
                   "header1": 2,
                   "header2": 3,
                   "header3": "someValue"
                  }



    ApiResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        status:
          type: string

Error: notImplemented: path "/metrics/": put: responses: 200: contents: unsupported content types: [text/json]
